headline: This Little-Known Chip Stock Is the Next ‘AI Power Play.’ Should You Buy It Now?
summary: Aixtron is a German semiconductor maker tapped by Kerrisdale and Barclays to benefit in the next wave of AI investing. Shares are up 33% in the last month.

headline: Exostellar Launches AIM Platform – The Industry’s First Unified AI Infrastructure Management Solution for Heterogeneous Compute
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., November 11, 2025--Exostellar, a leader in AI infrastructure orchestration and optimization, today announced the general availability (GA) of its AIM (AI Infrastructure Management) platform — the industry’s first solution to deliver unified control of multi-cluster GPU environments spanning on-premises, cloud, bare metal, and GPU-as-a-Service deployments. AIM provides a single pane of glass for managing and optimizing heterogeneous accelerators across NVIDIA, AMD, Intel, and

headline: Mizuho upgrades Skyworks and Qorvo after merger announcement
summary: Investing.com -- Mizuho upgraded Skyworks Solutions (NASDAQ: SWKS) and Qorvo (NASDAQ: QRVO) to Neutral following their planned merger, saying the deal provides “some valuation synergies” despite ongoing headwinds in the handset market.

headline: Looking at the Changing Narrative for Qualcomm After Key AI and Datacenter Developments
summary: QUALCOMM’s fair value estimate has recently risen from $179.67 to $187.71 as analysts adjust their projections upward. This change comes amid robust growth across the company’s handset, automotive, and IoT segments, as well as optimism about opportunities in new markets such as AI and datacenter. Stay tuned to discover how investors and analysts are staying ahead of these narrative shifts as QUALCOMM’s story continues to evolve. Stay updated as the Fair Value for QUALCOMM shifts by adding it...

headline: Grab Pilots High-Accuracy GPS Positioning System to Improve Location and Navigation Accuracy of GrabMaps in Singapore
summary: Grab x Oppo x QualComm x Swift Navigation Grab Pilots High-Accuracy GPS Positioning System to Improve Location and Navigation Accuracy of GrabMaps in Singapore The pilot programme, launched in collaboration with OPPO, Qualcomm Technologies and Swift Navigation, marks Southeast Asia’s first deployment of high-accuracy GPS in a mobile phone and app integration. headline: KeyBanc raises target on Arm Holdings plc (ARM) As Earnings Impress
summary: Arm Holdings plc (NASDAQ:ARM) is among the most profitable semiconductor stocks to buy. On November 6, analysts at KeyBanc reiterated an ‘Overweight’ rating on Arm Holdings plc (NASDAQ:ARM), while increasing the price target to $200 from $190, implying a potential upside of nearly 26%. This optimism follows the company’s robust second-quarter results, which demonstrated better-than-expected […]
